original_title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Toot Hill Road
text:
Flatbush Avenue, no. 911.
April 1971
Joseph Halpern, photographer

Two views of the front (west) facade of the old Erasmus Hall Academy, built 1787.

Erasmus Hall High School
Flatbush Avenue, no. 911
April 8, 1971
Joseph Halpern, photographer

View of the Flatbush Ave. arch, taken from within the school, and the rear of the statue of Erasmus.
title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue.
